title: Hybrid Warfare Interactive Music Library
description: Hybrid Warfare is a seamlessly looping, interactive music library. It's perfect for the game developer that wants dynamic music in his/her game. The library contains full compositions, which all has four different loops attached with their intensities.
longDescription:
Preview: soundcloud.com/eirikj/sets/hybrid-warfare-interactive

Hybrid Warfare is a seamlessly looping, interactive music library. It's perfect for the game developer that wants dynamic music in his/her game. The library contains four main compositions, which all has four different loops tagged with their intensities.

So you could have the ambience track play as the player roam around and then when something of mystery happens, you could fade to intensity "low". When you see the enemy, fade to intensity "medium" and then when you or they attack, switch to intensity "high", for full blown action mode!
technicalDetails:
• (2) .wav files and cues of full compositions (8 min of music)
• (18) .wav files and cues of loopable versions (53 min of music)
• (20) .wav and cue files total (61 min of music)
• All files are 44.1 khz, 16-bit Stereo WAVs
• Should work on all platforms
